vernac_cmds: Require Import Bool DecidableClass Algebra Ring PArith ROmega Omega.

Inductive formula := | formula_var : positive -> formula | formula_btm : formula | formula_top : formula | formula_cnj : formula -> formula -> formula | formula_dsj : formula -> formula -> formula | formula_neg : formula -> formula | formula_xor : formula -> formula -> formula | formula_ifb : formula -> formula -> formula -> formula.

Fixpoint formula_eval var f := match f with | formula_var x => list_nth x var false | formula_btm => false | formula_top => true | formula_cnj fl fr => (formula_eval var fl) && (formula_eval var fr) | formula_dsj fl fr => (formula_eval var fl) || (formula_eval var fr) | formula_neg f => negb (formula_eval var f) | formula_xor fl fr => xorb (formula_eval var fl) (formula_eval var fr) | formula_ifb fc fl fr => if formula_eval var fc then formula_eval var fl else formula_eval var fr end.

Fixpoint poly_of_formula f := match f with | formula_var x => Poly (Cst false) x (Cst true) | formula_btm => Cst false | formula_top => Cst true | formula_cnj fl fr => let pl := poly_of_formula fl in let pr := poly_of_formula fr in poly_mul pl pr | formula_dsj fl fr => let pl := poly_of_formula fl in let pr := poly_of_formula fr in poly_add (poly_add pl pr) (poly_mul pl pr) | formula_neg f => poly_add (Cst true) (poly_of_formula f) | formula_xor fl fr => poly_add (poly_of_formula fl) (poly_of_formula fr) | formula_ifb fc fl fr => let pc := poly_of_formula fc in let pl := poly_of_formula fl in let pr := poly_of_formula fr in poly_add pr (poly_add (poly_mul pc pl) (poly_mul pc pr)) end.
Lemma poly_of_formula_eval_compat : forall var f, eval var (poly_of_formula f) = formula_eval var f.
intros var f; induction f; simpl poly_of_formula; simpl formula_eval; auto.
now simpl; match goal with [ |- ?t = ?u ] => destruct u; reflexivity end.
now match goal with [ |- ?t = ?x || ?y ] => destruct x; destruct y; reflexivity end.
now match goal with [ |- ?t = negb ?x ] => destruct x; reflexivity end.
match goal with [ |- ?t = if ?b1 then ?b2 else ?b3 ] => destruct b1; destruct b2; destruct b3; reflexivity end.
Lemma poly_of_formula_valid_compat : forall f, exists n, valid n (poly_of_formula f).
exists (Pos.succ p); constructor; intuition; inversion H.
destruct IHf1 as [n1 Hn1]; destruct IHf2 as [n2 Hn2]; exists (Pos.max n1 n2); auto.
destruct IHf1 as [n1 Hn1]; destruct IHf2 as [n2 Hn2]; exists (Pos.max (Pos.max n1 n2) (Pos.max n1 n2)); auto.
destruct IHf as [n Hn]; exists (Pos.max 1 n); auto.
destruct IHf1 as [n1 Hn1]; destruct IHf2 as [n2 Hn2]; exists (Pos.max n1 n2); auto.
destruct IHf1 as [n1 Hn1]; destruct IHf2 as [n2 Hn2]; destruct IHf3 as [n3 Hn3]; eexists; eauto.
Lemma poly_of_formula_sound : forall fl fr var, poly_of_formula fl = poly_of_formula fr -> formula_eval var fl = formula_eval var fr.
Lemma reduce_poly_of_formula_sound : forall fl fr var, reduce (poly_of_formula fl) = reduce (poly_of_formula fr) -> formula_eval var fl = formula_eval var fr.
Definition make_last {A} n (x def : A) := Pos.peano_rect (fun _ => list A) (cons x nil) (fun _ F => cons def F) n.
Fixpoint list_replace l n b := match l with | nil => make_last n b false | cons a l => Pos.peano_rect _ (cons b l) (fun n _ => cons a (list_replace l n b)) n end.

Fixpoint boolean_witness p := match p with | Cst c => nil | Poly p i q => if decide (null p) then let var := boolean_witness q in list_replace var i true else let var := boolean_witness p in list_replace var i false end.
Lemma list_nth_base : forall A (def : A) l, list_nth 1 l def = match l with nil => def | cons x _ => x end.
intros A def l; unfold list_nth.
Lemma list_nth_succ : forall A n (def : A) l, list_nth (Pos.succ n) l def = match l with nil => def | cons _ l => list_nth n l def end.
intros A def l; unfold list_nth.
Lemma list_nth_nil : forall A n (def : A), list_nth n nil def = def.
intros A n def; induction n using Pos.peano_rect.
Lemma make_last_nth_1 : forall A n i x def, i <> n -> list_nth i (@make_last A n x def) def = def.
intros A n; induction n using Pos.peano_rect; intros i x def Hd; unfold make_last; simpl.
induction i using Pos.peano_case; [elim Hd; reflexivity|].
unfold make_last; rewrite Pos.peano_rect_succ; fold (make_last n x def).
rewrite list_nth_succ; apply IHn; zify; omega.
Lemma make_last_nth_2 : forall A n x def, list_nth n (@make_last A n x def) def = x.
intros A n; induction n using Pos.peano_rect; intros x def; simpl.
unfold make_last; rewrite Pos.peano_rect_succ; fold (make_last n x def).
Lemma list_replace_nth_1 : forall var i j x, i <> j -> list_nth i (list_replace var j x) false = list_nth i var false.
intros var; induction var; intros i j x Hd; simpl.
induction i using Pos.peano_rect; [now elim Hd; auto|].
Lemma list_replace_nth_2 : forall var i x, list_nth i (list_replace var i x) false = x.
intros var; induction var; intros i x; simpl.
Lemma boolean_witness_nonzero : forall k p, linear k p -> ~ null p -> eval (boolean_witness p) p = true.
intros k p Hl Hp; induction Hl; simpl.
match goal with [ |- (if ?b then true else false) = true ] => assert (Hrw : b = true); [|rewrite Hrw; reflexivity] end.
erewrite eval_suffix_compat; [now eauto| |now apply linear_valid_incl; eauto].
now intros j Hd; apply list_replace_nth_1; zify; omega.
erewrite eval_suffix_compat; [now eauto| |now apply linear_valid_incl; eauto].
now intros j Hd; apply list_replace_nth_1; zify; omega.
Lemma reduce_poly_of_formula_sound_alt : forall var fl fr, reduce (poly_add (poly_of_formula fl) (poly_of_formula fr)) = Cst false -> formula_eval var fl = formula_eval var fr.
rewrite <- xorb_false_l; change false with (eval var (Cst false)).

command: intros var f; induction f; simpl poly_of_formula; simpl formula_eval; auto.
now simpl; match goal with [ |- ?t = ?u ] => destruct u; reflexivity end.
now match goal with [ |- ?t = ?x || ?y ] => destruct x; destruct y; reflexivity end.
now match goal with [ |- ?t = negb ?x ] => destruct x; reflexivity end.
match goal with [ |- ?t = if ?b1 then ?b2 else ?b3 ] => destruct b1; destruct b2; destruct b3; reflexivity end.

destruct IHf1 as [n1 Hn1]; destruct IHf2 as [n2 Hn2]; exists (Pos.max n1 n2); auto.
destruct IHf1 as [n1 Hn1]; destruct IHf2 as [n2 Hn2]; exists (Pos.max (Pos.max n1 n2) (Pos.max n1 n2)); auto.
destruct IHf as [n Hn]; exists (Pos.max 1 n); auto.
destruct IHf1 as [n1 Hn1]; destruct IHf2 as [n2 Hn2]; exists (Pos.max n1 n2); auto.
destruct IHf1 as [n1 Hn1]; destruct IHf2 as [n2 Hn2]; destruct IHf3 as [n3 Hn3]; eexists; eauto.
intros A def l; unfold list_nth.
intros A def l; unfold list_nth.
intros A n def; induction n using Pos.peano_rect.
intros A n; induction n using Pos.peano_rect; intros i x def Hd; unfold make_last; simpl.
induction i using Pos.peano_case; [elim Hd; reflexivity|].
unfold make_last; rewrite Pos.peano_rect_succ; fold (make_last n x def).
rewrite list_nth_succ; apply IHn; zify; omega.
intros A n; induction n using Pos.peano_rect; intros x def; simpl.
unfold make_last; rewrite Pos.peano_rect_succ; fold (make_last n x def).
intros var; induction var; intros i j x Hd; simpl.
induction i using Pos.peano_rect; [now elim Hd; auto|].
intros var; induction var; intros i x; simpl.
intros k p Hl Hp; induction Hl; simpl.
match goal with [ |- (if ?b then true else false) = true ] => assert (Hrw : b = true); [|rewrite Hrw; reflexivity] end.
erewrite eval_suffix_compat; [now eauto| |now apply linear_valid_incl; eauto].
now intros j Hd; apply list_replace_nth_1; zify; omega.
erewrite eval_suffix_compat; [now eauto| |now apply linear_valid_incl; eauto].
now intros j Hd; apply list_replace_nth_1; zify; omega.
rewrite <- xorb_false_l; change false with (eval var (Cst false)).
